attributes.action: PREVENT OWNERS OF HIGHER VALUE CARS, OR THOSE OVER 1800cc FROM CLAIMING FREE PARKING AND FREE ROAD TAX
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems extemely unfair and wrong that many drivers who display disabled parking badges receive free parking, free road tax and are exempt from congestion charging,yet are driving high value vehicles.These drivers should pay the same charges as other road users. This does not include those vehicles that have been specially modified, or are an important means of transport for those with limited means of movement.These badge holders should still have designated parking, but should also pay.
